abilities.name: Walk
abilities.description: Move up to _moveSpeed tiles. Cannot pass through enemies or obstacles.

abilities.name: Boomerang
abilities.description: Deal _damage damage to a target within range. Finishing

abilities.name: Space Sword
abilities.description: Deal _damage damage to an adjacent target. Ignores armor. Finishing

abilities.name: SNEAK ATTACK!!
abilities.description: All allies within range gain _gainTurnMeter Turn Meter and +1 Movement Speed for _duration turns.

abilities.name: Flying Kick-A-Pow
abilities.description: Shove an adjacent enemy back _moveEffectRange tiles. If they hit an obstacle, they become Stunned for _duration turns.

abilities.name: Stink Bomb
abilities.description: Throw a stink bomb to a tile within range. All adjacent enemies become Silenced for _duration turns.
